British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Our school website now hosts informative pages detailing our Private Instrumental Lessons Programme for YR2 - YR9 children. For those parents with children interested in a) pursuing private instrumental lessons starting September 2013 b) continuing this years private instrumental lessons September 2013, please visit our website, complete and scan the PDF application form and email to the given address by the suggested deadline date, Tuesday 20th August 2013. Please note applications received after this date will not be timetabled.
Please follow the link to our Private Instrumental Lessons Page:
http://www.britishschool.edu.my/en/school-life/music/instrumental-lessons.aspx
Many thanks
Alex Douglas Head of Instrumental Music
Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
